original_text: And they went every one straight forward: whither the spirit was to go, they went; and they turned not when they went.
korean_text: 영이 어떤 쪽으로 가면 그 생물들도 그대로 가되 돌이키지 아니하고 일제히 앞으로 곧게 행하며

sentences.original_text: And they went every one straight forward
whither the spirit was to go
and they turned not when they went
